name: cleverbrush-framework
description: Cleverbrush Framework - a set of libraries used by Cleverbrush, a web-based publishing application

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build_async && npm run build_deep && npm run build_knex-clickhouse && npm run build_schema && npm run build_scheduler && npm run build_mapper
scripts.clean: npm run clean_async && npm run clean_deep && npm run clean_knex-clickhouse && npm run clean_schema && npm run clean_scheduler
scripts.publish: npm run clean && npm run build && npm publish --workspace @cleverbrush/schema --access=public && npm publish --workspace @cleverbrush/deep --access=public && npm publish --workspace @cleverbrush/knex-clickhouse --access=public && npm publish --workspace @cleverbrush/async --access=public && npm publish --workspace @cleverbrush/scheduler --access=public && npm publish --workspace @cleverbrush/mapper --access=public
scripts.publish:beta: npm run clean && npm run build && npm publish --tag beta --workspace @cleverbrush/deep --access=public && npm publish --tag beta --workspace @cleverbrush/knex-clickhouse --access=public && npm publish --tag beta --workspace @cleverbrush/async --access=public && npm publish --tag beta --workspace @cleverbrush/schema --access=public && npm publish --tag beta --workspace @cleverbrush/scheduler --access=public && npm publish --tag beta --workspace @cleverbrush/mapper --access=public

author: Andrew Zolotukhin <andrew_zol@cleverbrush.com>
